subject: VisitorTrack appId - LIVE on TEST
body:
Dash,

Backend change is live on TEST. appId is now being captured in:

- `VisitorTrackingHistory.appId` (1=TangoTiempo, 2=HarmonyJunction, null=old records)
- `VisitorTrackingAnalytics.appId` (most recent app used)

Sarah's frontend v1.19.20 is also on TEST, so new data should start flowing.

You can start planning the Visitor-by-App report in CalOps when ready.

- Fulton
